level.heading: Real property tax assignment; sale and transfers - Applicability of changed interest rates.
Prior Codifications
level.text: Temporary Repeal of Section For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 4(l) of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-8, June 13, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 5916).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 4(j)(2) of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-22, March 16, 2001, 48 DCR 2706).
